recipes.name: The original abomination
recipes.description: This abomination was the original reason the sandwich calculator was made.  You wouldn't think that whipped cream and horseradish would work so well together, but, somehow, it gets the job done.

recipes.name: Potato Salad Sausage Roll
recipes.description: Savory potato salad and spicy chorizo come together in this sandwich surprisingly well.  Whipped cream adds a note of sweetness and authentic wasabi gives it a spicy-sweet kick.

recipes.name: Salad-on-a-bun With Rice
recipes.description: Rice, boiled eggs, and lettuce.  These were the ingredients chosen to make this ... well, I don't know if you could call it a sandwich.  It tastes a lot like a very rice-laden salad on a bun.  Horseradish and chili sauce give it a spicy kick.
